summary: This is a forwarded email chain from November 2020 regarding a new therapy client who is a confirmed victim of Jeffrey Epstein. A licensed psychotherapist informs a colleague that they will begin treating this individual for trauma related to Epstein's abuse starting December 8, 2020.

persons.name: M.S.
persons.context: The sender of the original email, a Licensed Mental Health Counselor and Certified Sexual Abuse Trauma specialist in Greenacres, Florida, who informs a colleague about taking on a new client who is a victim of Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referred to as 'Mr. Epstein,' the individual whose actions caused the victimization for which the new client is seeking therapy.

connections.description: M.S. is a therapist treating a victim of Jeffrey Epstein's abuse.

events.title: Therapy commencement for Epstein victim
events.description: The licensed psychotherapist M.S. schedules to begin therapy treatment for a new client who is a victim of Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: A new therapy client, who is a confirmed victim of Jeffrey Epstein, reached out for treatment in late 2020.
Therapy sessions for this victim were scheduled to begin on December 8, 2020.
The treating professional is M.S., a Licensed Mental Health Counselor and Certified Sexual Abuse Trauma specialist based in Greenacres, Florida.
The email communication is from November 2020, indicating victims were still seeking professional help for Epstein-related trauma years after the main events and his death.
The correspondence is forwarded internally, suggesting a professional consultation or notification process regarding the client's victim status.
